stag.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone who buys new shares in a company in order to sell them quickly and make a profit, rather than to keep them as an investment
stag.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to buy shares in a company in order to sell them quickly and make a profit, rather than to keep them as an investment
stag.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Substantially reducing the pricing of the tender  (=formal statement of the price) makes it unpopular with those who like to stag new issues.
